item.title: Clearing And Settlement For Global Financial Institutions
item.description: Preliminary notes: Contact me- https://twitter.com/kanzure Clearing and settlement for global financial institutions Matthew Bishop, The Economist - Moderator Charles Cascarilla, itBit Chris Church, Digital Asset Holdings Brad Peterson, Nasdaq Sandra Ro, CME Group MB: Good evening. Nearly time for a drink, but before that we will have a stimulating conversation about payments and settlement. It’s one of the startups coming in and got a banking license, mainstream next to him is Chris Church who is running one of the companies at hte moment that is a startup digital asset holdings.
